transArray.content: The location is easy to find, right at the intersection of Yaojiayuan and Shifoying Road. There is a Big Yali Hotel at the door. The room is very clean, the facilities and equipment are very new, the bed is very soft, I slept very comfortably! Breakfast starts at seven o'clock. On the first floor, there is a Chinese and Western buffet with many varieties. It tastes great too! Iâ€™ll stay here next time I drive!

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a favorable review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new and clean. It is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City. You can shop and eat there. It is very convenient. Breakfast The central buffet is rich and delicious, as well as free parking and laundry. I hope this hotel will become your first choice in Beijing and sincerely look forward to your visit again!
